name: dyson-sphere
title: Dyson Sphere SLP
author: SLywnow
description: Generate 1TW (1000GW) of energy by creating a megastructure-the Dyson sphere. (Attention, creating a Dyson sphere leads to the disappearance of light in the entire star system!). This mod required for many of my mods (or you can try generate such energy by yourself, good luck)
